Uses of Class
net.recommenders.rival.evaluation.strategy.AbstractStrategy

  • Packages that use AbstractStrategy 
    Package Description
    net.recommenders.rival.evaluation.strategy  

    • Uses of AbstractStrategy in net.recommenders.rival.evaluation.strategy

      Subclasses of AbstractStrategy in net.recommenders.rival.evaluation.strategy 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  AllItems
      An evaluation strategy where all the items are used as candidates.
      class  RelPlusN
      Implementation of the Relevant + N Evaluation Strategy as described by Cremonesi et al.
      class  TestItems
      An evaluation strategy where only the test items are used as candidates.
      class  TrainItems
      An evaluation strategy where only the items in training are used as candidates.
      class  UserTest
      An evaluation strategy where only the items in the user's test are used as candidates.
